ns2:member.name: NOT_HIGH_LOAD
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Release inactive UEs at handover when MP load level is at least NOT_HIGH.

ns2:member.name: HIGH_LOAD
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Release inactive UEs at handover when MP load level is at least HIGH.

ns2:member.name: VERY_HIGH_LOAD
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Release inactive UEs at handover when MP load level is at least VERY_HIGH.

ns2:member.name: OBSOLETE_ONLY_IN_7_1_301
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Release inactive UEs at handover when MP load level is at least VERY_HIGH.

ns2:member.name: OBSOLETE_IN_VERSION
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Release inactive UEs at handover when MP load level is at least VERY_HIGH.
